abstract: New York’s attorney general had accusing Actavis of forcing patients to switch to a newer version of the drug to thwart competition from generic manufacturers.
snippet: New York’s attorney general had accusing Actavis of forcing patients to switch to a newer version of the drug to thwart competition from generic manufacturers.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge has decided to block for now an attempt by the drug company Actavis to halt sales of an older form of its Alzheimer’s disease drug Namenda in favor of a newer version with a longer patent life.

headline.main: Judge Rules Drug Maker Can’t Shelve Old Pill
headline.print_headline: Judge Rules Drug Maker Can’t Shelve Old Pill
